00029 #ifndef SC_SEMAPHORE_IF_H
00030 #define SC_SEMAPHORE_IF_H
00031 
00032 #include "sysc/communication/sc_interface.h"
00033 
00034 namespace sc_core {
00035 
00036 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //  CLASS : sc_semaphore_if
00038 //
00039 //  The sc_semaphore_if interface class.
00040 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 class SC_API sc_semaphore_if
00043 : virtual public sc_interface
00044 {
00045 public:
00046 
00047     // the classical operations: wait(), trywait(), and post()
00048 
00049     // lock (take) the semaphore, block if not available
00050     virtual int wait() = 0;
00051 
00052     // lock (take) the semaphore, return -1 if not available
00053     virtual int trywait() = 0;
00054 
00055     // unlock (give) the semaphore
00056     virtual int post() = 0;
00057 
00058     // get the value of the semphore
00059     virtual int get_value() const = 0;
00060 
00061 protected:
00062 
00063     // constructor
00064 
00065     sc_semaphore_if()
00066         {}
00067 
00068 private:
00069 
00070     // disabled
00071     sc_semaphore_if( const sc_semaphore_if& );
00072     sc_semaphore_if& operator = ( const sc_semaphore_if& );
00073 };
00074 
00075 } // namespace sc_core
00076
